ConstructorError.default: The value passed to the constructor is invalid.
ConstructorError.defined: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be supplied.
ConstructorError.required: The {1} argument of {0} constructor is required.
ConstructorError.string: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be a string.
ConstructorError.optString: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be a string or null.
ConstructorError.manString: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be a non-empty string.
ConstructorError.optNumber: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be a number value or null.
ConstructorError.manNumber: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be a number value.
ConstructorError.optInteger: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be an integer value or null.
ConstructorError.manInteger: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be an integer value.
ConstructorError.optBoolean: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be a Boolean value or null.
ConstructorError.manBoolean: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be a Boolean value.
ConstructorError.optObject: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be an object or null.
ConstructorError.manObject: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be an object.
ConstructorError.optFunction: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be a function or null.
ConstructorError.manFunction: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be a function.
ConstructorError.optType: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be a {2} object or null.
ConstructorError.manType: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be a {2} object.
ConstructorError.modelType: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be {2} type.
ConstructorError.enumType: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be an enumeration type.
ConstructorError.enumMember: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be a {2} item.
ConstructorError.optArray: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be an array of {2} objects, or a single {2} object or null.
ConstructorError.manArray: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be an array of {2} objects or a single {2} object.
ConstructorError.optArrayPrim: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be an array of {2} values, or a single {2} values or null.
ConstructorError.manArrayPrim: The {1} argument of {0} constructor must be an array of {2} values or a single {2} values.
ConstructorError.properties: All arguments of {0} constructor must be a PropertyInfo object.
ConstructorError.rule: The last 3 arguments of {0} constructor can be: a string as the message, an integer as the priority and a Boolean as the stopsProcessing argument.
